item.title: Can't Open Batch File (HELP PLEASE)
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

When I click on the client batch file it just opens fast and then closes
can anyone teamviewer me and help fix this I posted this in client help but it didn’t do much good with what the person said so I am going to try here

This is the code

@echo off title Trinity-PvP :main cd Files start JavaW -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Things I’ve Tried

[code]@echo off
title Trinity-PvP
:main
cd Files
JavaW -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

@echo off
title Trinity-PvP
:main
cd Files
Java-Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

@echo off
title Trinity-PvP
:main
cd Files
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\ -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

@echo off
title Trinity-PvP
:main
cd Files
C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\ -Xmx500m - cp.;Theme.jar Gui
[/code]

Read full topic
